author: agnxsh
content:
Nimbus is planning to use it's unstable branch for both Pectra and Peerdas from now on, which is why, if a new peerdas devnet is launched in the next couple of weeks, we would really like peerdas to be activated at Fulu, coming after Electra, in order to keep pectra and peerdas functionality separate, atleast till there are enough pectra testnet runs confirming that pectra is totally ok, and pectra and peerdas can co-exist in the same fork.

cc <@412614104222531604> <@199561711278227457> <@415109946682769408>
